content: **mince pie ornament crochet pattern** give the crochet mince pie free pattern a go and craft your own delightful christmas ornaments this beginner-friendly tutorial will walk you through making a charming christmas decoration shaped like a festive mince pie an ideal addition to your holiday tree featuring a sweet smile and a lovely star-topped crust this free pattern is perfect for crocheters of any skill level to enjoy the crochet pattern is 4 pages long and written in english and us crochet terms the pattern contains plenty of progress photos to guide you along and is an easy skill level project **supplies** 4mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle 5mm safety eyes black embroidery thread **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a almond b green c red d brown total 20 yards **gauge** 4mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 4 row of 7 double_crochet **finished size** width 7 5cm x height 7 5cm **abbreviations us terms ** chain chain double_crochet double_crochet 2dc 2 double_crochet in 1 space increase magic_ring magic_ring r round / row single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches treble_crochet treble_crochet **skill level** easy **notes** a free online basic version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/christmas-ornament-crochet-mince-pie-free-pattern/
